meanings.definition: The study of the larynx and its diseases.
meanings.sent1: In laryngology, doctors learn about the voice box and its illnesses.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in laryngology to focus on throat issues.
meanings.sent3: The laryngology class was so interesting that even the quietest student spoke up.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to laryngology was as clear as a bell ringing in a silent room.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on laryngology made the complexities of the throat easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the larynx and its disorders.
meanings.sent1: Laryngology is crucial for treating voice box problems effectively.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in laryngology often work with singers and actors.
meanings.sent3: The laryngology department was always buzzing with patients seeking help.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in laryngology was a beacon of hope for those with throat issues.
meanings.sent5: The advancements in laryngology have improved treatments for larynx conditions.
